May 15, 1961
Mr. James S. Miles
Director
Program Service and Distribution Division
MAPTI
Memorial Center
Purdue University
Lafayette, Indiana
Dear Jim:
Thanks so much for your hospitality and the
time and trouble you took to tour me about.
Enclosed is a check for $10 to repay the
loan you so kindly provided.
Hello to the good wife and my compliments
to you both on a most effective "extension" job
on the house.
Les gefliegen!
Cordially,
William G. Harley
WGH :mem
P* S.
Re Int. Seminar ~~ McBride is fine and stands
well with NETRC; Hull always makes a good impression
and contribution. Marty Codell, still on staff of
TV DIGEST is a commercial guy vitally consumed with
TV on the international level.
